server.data

Class FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.data.FileManager

  • public class FileManager
extends Object
    Class for operations on the filedata collection, which stores file metadata.
    Author:
    soleksiy

      • getDeltaCursor

        public String getDeltaCursor(String uid)
        Gets delta cursor (Dropbox-specific) for a given user UID. If the user already retrieved delta data before, delta cursor is not null.
        Parameters:
        uid -
        Returns:
        Delta cursor

      • saveDeltaCursor

        public void saveDeltaCursor(String uid,
                   String deltaCursor)
        Saves a given delta cursor (Dropbox-specific) in the database.
        Parameters:
        uid - User UID
        deltaCursor - Delta cursor to save

      • removeFileEntry

        public void removeFileEntry(FileEntry entry,
                   String uid)
        Used in case of restore. Removes from the database the version that was restored to the previous version. A design choice Can also hide it and have some way of showing it if needed.
        Parameters:
        entry -
        uid -

      • updateFileSetDeleted

        public void updateFileSetDeleted(FileEntry deletionEntry,
                        String uid)
        Updates a file to set it deleted. DeletionEntry may not have the correct _id in the context if we are updating it for ALL users (shared folder)
        Parameters:
        deletionEntry - FileEntry to delete
        uid - User UID

      • restoreAncestors

        public void restoreAncestors(String userUid,
                    String toPath,
                    long folderSeqTo)
        In case a file is inserted/restored in a folder hierarchy where some ancestors may be marked as deleted, we need to undelete those ancestors.

      • getPathToFileRelativeToSharedRoot

        public String getPathToFileRelativeToSharedRoot(List<SharedFolder> sharedFolders,
                                       String userUid,
                                       String userFullPath)
        Gets the part of the path that is appended to the "shared root path" to form the full path e.g. given "/Sharing/File.txt", and "/Sharing", gets /File.txt The part /File.txt will be the same for all users
        Parameters:
        sharedFolders -
        userUid -
        userFullPath -
        Returns:
        Path to the file relative to the shared folder root

      • listChildrenForPath

        public FileData listChildrenForPath(String userUid,
                           String path,
                           boolean includeDeleted,
                           boolean markLastSeen)
        Gets data for given path, its immediate children, but not subdirectories. It is like /home2/path --> listing path
        Parameters:
        userUid -
        path -
        includeDeleted - True if you also want to include deleted/shadow files.
        markLastSeen - True if you want to mark the files as last seen.
        Returns:
        FileData object that contains a file list.

      • listDescendants

        public FileData listDescendants(String userUid,
                       String path,
                       boolean includeDeleted)
        Lists all the descendants of a given file, no matter how deep in the hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        userUid -
        path -
        includeDeleted - True if you also want to list deleted/shadow files.
        Returns:
        FileData object that contains a file list.

      • listEntryAndDescendants

        Lists a given entry (folder) as well as its descendants.
        Parameters:
        userUid -
        path -
        includeDeleted - True if you want to include deleted/shadow files
        Returns:
        FileData object that contains a file list.
